Nantlin was a horse breeder and Harper in the midâ€“8 century DR.
After emerging from the tomb of an old Netherese wizard in the , the Chosen of Mystra, Elminster Aumar, wandered the land using the alias of "Wanlorn". He met the horse breeder Nantlin at some point after that.Given the long hibernation of Elminster prior to that time, he is extremely unlikely to have previous knowledge of contemporary horse breeders, or Harpers even.
At some point prior to the , Elminster liberated Buckralams Starn from the bandits of the Iron Fox. After that, he told a local woman, Immeira, to look for the horse breeder Nantlin at Saern Hill. He also told her to ask if his harp sounded as sweet as ever, strongly implying the man was a Harper.
